attributes.action: Lower energy prices down again, to levels affordable for all people!!
attributes.additional_details:
I refuse to allow my children to be cold in 2022!!! People are going to die by freezing to death in their own homes, because they cannot afford to heat their homes! 
Mr Prime minister would you allow your children,  mother, grandmother to sit in their house in the cold? No I didn't think so!? 
Capping the energy bills to March 2023 of £2,500 then allowing it to rise to £3000 PER YEAR isn't good enough! 
People/vulnerable people will die this winter. 
Energy prices need to go back down and fast!!
attributes.background:
I want the government to look at the prices of energy. Gas prices are extortionate. I am a single parent of 3 children and my daily gas usage is £14 a DAY. This is not acceptable. 
My electric is around £5-£7 PER DAY!!!

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar
